comments:
When trying to access the 'Installed AJAX Runtimes' in Window->Preferences->ATF,
I receive an Error with the message "An error has occurred. See error log for more details".
OS: Vista 64-bit
Eclipse:
  Version: 3.2.2
  Build id: M20070212-1330
ATF: ATF build 0.2.1-v200703061126

I have appended the Stack trace:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1

Opened a bug (#177580) on SWT because I have a feeling that this is a problem there and not on ATF.

I lowered it to normal because this problem does not show up on Win XP.
I don't have a Vista machine to test with, but this preference page has completely changed in the milestone M3. Reopen the bug if you still have the problem with Milestone 3.
